result.eng: Assuming he is right, where does that leave us?

result.ponchtml: Abraimis go ḃfuil an ceart aige Cá ḃfágann sé sin muidneAssuming he is right, where does that leave us?

result.eng: Do you think that she is right?
result.ga: An dóigh leat go bhfuil an ceart aici

result.eng: Where is your right hand?
result.ga: Cá bhfuil an lámh dheas agat
result.orig: Cá bhfuil an lámh dheas agat
result.html: Cá bhfuil an lámh dheas agatWhere is your right hand?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil an láṁ ḋeas agatWhere is your right hand?

result.eng: Was Darwin right about evolution in nature?

result.eng: The parliament will have the right to amend the budget.
result.ga: Beidh de cheart ag an pharlaimint an buiséad a leasú

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ de ċeart ag an ṗarlaimint an buiséad a leasúThe parliament will have the right to amend the budget.

result.eng: I feel that something is not right.
result.ga: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach

result.html: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealachI feel that something is not right.
result.ponchtml: Braiṫim go ḃfuil rud éigin as bealaċI feel that something is not right.

result.eng: What does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?

result.eng: We must do it right this time.

result.html: Caithfidh muid é a dhéanamh i gceart an uair seoWe must do it right this time.

result.eng: Turn right at the second crossroads.

result.ponchtml: Cas ar ḋeis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.

result.eng: You will see the shop on the right.

result.eng: You are right.

result.html: Is fíor duitYou are right.

result.eng: That's right but they won't believe us.

result.eng: As for the thing you said, you are right, but...

result.eng: If my memory serves me right. If I remember correctly.

result.eng: This is not the right time to talk to me.

result.eng: It doesn't even work right.

result.eng: You may be right.

result.eng: That is the right answer.

result.eng: I am right but I can't prove it.
